title: Remove Aadhar and PAN fields from customer request form

requirements.summary: Remove the Aadhar number input field from the customer request form
acceptanceCriteria: The Aadhar number field is no longer visible in the customer request form
Form validation no longer checks for Aadhar number
Form can be submitted without Aadhar number

file_operations.description: Remove the Aadhar number input field from the form JSX and remove the 'aadharNumber' field from the form state management and validation logic. Ensure the form can be submitted without this field while maintaining existing form layout and styling consistency.

requirements.summary: Remove the PAN number input field from the customer request form
acceptanceCriteria: The PAN number field is no longer visible in the customer request form
Form validation no longer checks for PAN number
Form can be submitted without PAN number

file_operations.description: Remove the PAN number input field from the form JSX and remove the 'panNumber' field from the form state management and validation logic. Ensure the form can be submitted without this field while maintaining existing form layout and styling consistency.

requirements.summary: Update the WhatsApp message template to exclude Aadhar and PAN number fields
acceptanceCriteria: WhatsApp messages generated from customer requests no longer include Aadhar number
WhatsApp messages generated from customer requests no longer include PAN number
Message formatting remains clean and properly structured

file_operations.description: Update the customer request WhatsApp message template to remove Aadhar and PAN number fields from the message body. Ensure the message formatting remains clean and properly structured without these fields.
